document_data.name: ''Shock Dart''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shock darts''''' were small [[enchanted]] thrown weapons that dealt lightning damage to their targets.
document_data.Powers: These [[dart]]s were small enough to be easily concealed. Upon closer exemption, carved lines of power could be seen on each of the missiles. When they reached the target, these darts released a burst of electricity.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, ''shock darts'' were used by [[Aurilian]] [[druid]]s who resided in the secluded village of [[Andora]], deep in [[Icewind Dale]]'s wilderness.
